title: The Lady in The Window A compilation of short Horror stories
description: Ghosts, dragons,monsters, oh my! In The Lady in The Window, you will find a variety of tales that will haunt your dreams captivate your imagination and leave you wanting more! Five stories in total. An urban legend that goes to show maybe you should take them seriously, A mythical creature come to life to steal away a young mans heart. A woman who seeks revenge on the creature who hurt her child, but she too has a secret. A spell that gets to the heart of the matter. Read at your own risk. If you like a little scare this short book is for you.
author: Angel Ernst
